rules.content: Whenever you discard a card, you may have ~ deal 1 damage to any target.
+2: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
+1: Discard your hand, then draw two cards.
-4: Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

tags.setting: A tall red-robed light-skinned man stands inside a circular chamber filled with floating, burning scrolls. The bottom half of the picture shows the dark stone ground on which he is standing.
